TABLE.NAME: quiz_overview_regrades
TABLE.COMMENT: This table records which question attempts need regrading and the grade they will be regraded to.

FIELD.NAME: questionusageid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references question_usages.id, or equivalently quiz_attempt.uniqueid.

FIELD.NAME: newfraction
FIELD.COMMENT: The new fraction for this question_attempt after regrading.

FIELD.NAME: oldfraction
FIELD.COMMENT: The previous fraction for this question_attempt.

FIELD.NAME: regraded
FIELD.COMMENT: set to 0 if element has just been regraded. Set to 1 if element has been marked as needing regrading.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this row was last modified.
